title: Correct Lore and Knowledge tab label across admin dashboard and Lore page

requirements.text: Update user-facing text so the site consistently uses the label "Lore and Knowledge" (with "and", not "&") wherever this page/tab is named (including the top navigation link, the Lore page title/heading, and any related intro text).

quotes: That is supposed to say Lore and knowledge tab and build it cuz I fixed my typo!

acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation displays the link label exactly as "Lore and Knowledge".
The Lore page (currently at route "/lore") renders page title and primary heading exactly as "Lore and Knowledge".
No remaining user-facing occurrences of "Lore & Knowledge" remain for this page/tab label (excluding code identifiers/filenames).

requirements.text: Ensure the Admin Dashboard left sidebar tab label is spelled "Lore and Knowledge" (correcting the previously-typed "lure" typo), and that the tab list includes a "Lore and Knowledge" entry (exact capitalization) in the admin navigation.

quotes: there should be a lure and knowledge tab which is the blog below the testimonies tab
That is supposed to say Lore and knowledge tab and build it cuz I fixed my typo!

acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard sidebar includes a tab labeled exactly "Lore and Knowledge".
There are no user-facing references to "Lure and knowledge" in the admin UI.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui (Shadcn UI sources).
Do not modify files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts(x), frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Implementing Stripe payments, flippable shop cards, or other previously discussed Phase One e-commerce features.
Adding new blog CMS functionality (posts can remain static as currently implemented).
